Our Programmes

Thrilling Thursdays

Thursday is dedicated for events. We will rotate between Drama Play, Nature Walk, Little Chef, Special Theme Event and of course, Field Trips. Our Drama Play will be based on our Book of The Month.

Islamic Study Fridays

Friday is dedicated for Early Islamic Study. We will have a storytelling session during Circle Time covering Aqidah, Akhlak and Sirah. We then will proceed with our weekly Solat Dhuha and Solat Hajat.

Fun Phonics Lesson

Our Phonics lesson is based on Bacalah Anakku method. We have big group phonics lesson daily and small group phonics lesson every Tuesday and Wednesday.

Fun Daily Play
Exploration Projects

Our daily projects will be based on our weekly and monthly theme. The themes are based on developing self identity, cognitive, learning about the natural world and our community.

Nature Walk

This is our monthly program where we will have activities at our extended outdoor classroom, our neighbourhood park and also the paddy field.

Little Chef

We have monthly event where we will make food and drinks from scratch. The children alongside our teachers will be making different kind of food based on our monthly theme.

Tadika Insan Alami is an Experiencial Learning based Kindergarten for children 4 to 6 years old!

Let's get in touch
